artist: Artist: Ryūryūkyo Shinsai; Author: Poem by Wakintei Uraginu; Author: Poem by Washōtei Uyō; Author: Poem by Wahōtei Manrai
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
和錦亭裡衣 [...]
和松亭羽昜 [...]
和寶亭満雷 [...]
markings: above the title: drum seal of the poetry group Taikoren
medium: Woodblock print (surimono); ink, color, and metallic powder on paper
portfolio: From The Tale of Genji (Genji monogatari 源氏物語)
text: related to the chs. 4–6 of the Tale of Genji and therefore maybe the 2nd design in this series
title: The Chapters "The Twilight Beauty," "Young Murasaki," and "The Safflower"
